mapper.update: update alg_payment_info set usr_sn = #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, street = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pay_sn = #{paySn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select pay_sn, usr_sn, street, city, country, zip_code from alg_payment_info
